SEARCH
Package polimi.ingsoft.server.model.publicboard

Class PublicBoard

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsoft.server.model.publicboard.PublicBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PublicBoard extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents a game's public board, where players can draw cards and look at the common QuestCards
See Also:
